QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Nagrand!
QuestData.Description:
All able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to Lieutenant Balfor in Nagrand on Draenor.
Yrel is recommending that the Alliance establish an outpost in Nagrand to help in our fight against the Warsong clan.
Secure a flight to Nagrand and meet up with Lieutenant Balfor and the supply caravan.
Glory to the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Lieutenant Balfor in Nagrand on Draenor.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Lieutenant Balfor in Nagrand on Draenor.
QuestData.RewardText:
They came at us... from... nowhere.
<The lieutenant nearly passes out.>
